sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import { ReactComponent as IconBootstrapFill } from "bootstrap-icons/icons/bootstrap-fill.svg"; const Invoice = () => { return (
Invoice
Invoice Date:{" "} {new Date(Date.now()).toLocaleDateString()}
Invoice No: {`#1234567890`}
From
Twitter, Inc.
1355 Market St, Suite 900
San Francisco, CA 94103
P: (123) 456-7890
To
Twitter, Inc.
1355 Market St, Suite 900
San Francisco, CA 94103
P: (123) 456-7890
Peoduct Description Rate QTY Amount
plumbing material Maecenas suscipit volutpat gravida. Nulla hendrerit nisi a lectus blandit aliquam. Integer enim magna, consequat sed justo nec, auctor sagittis urna. $50.00 10 $500.00
Sweater Nulla sodales sit amet orci eu vehicula. $120.00 10 $1200.00
Jeans A pair of nice jeans $450.00 1 $450.00
Sub Total: $2150.00
Tax: $215.00
Total: $2365.00

NOTE : This is computer generated receipt and does not require physical signature.

Print Download
); }; export default Invoice;
